name: Drop the Monolith: A Kubrick's Oddyssey
name_original: Drop the Monolith: A Kubrick's Oddyssey
description:
Drop the Monolith: A Kubrick's Oddyssey is a game developed by Peppe Reres. It was originally released in 2019.
You can play Drop the Monolith: A Kubrick's Oddyssey on PC and macOS. The game is sold via itch.io.
